meaningMnemonic: ハチ is a bee. Buzz buzz. Just imagine "eight bees" combining into one bee, making it a "hachi." Then, there's a <kanji>nest</kanji>. What is a nest for bees? A <vocabulary>beehive</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: 巣 is a standalone word here, so it uses the same reading that you learned when you learned the vocabulary.
